name: Aaron Sanders
welcome_message: Hello. I'm Aaron, a full stack developer based in Los Angeles, CA. I have delivered solutions in Point-of-Sale, gaming, and mobile banking applications. My passion is problem solving, context discovery, and technical writing, but it's strong work ownership that drives me.

about_me.bio: My name is Aaron Sanders and I'm an web applications engineer who relishes in problem solving. I earned my Computer Science bachelor's and master's from UCR, worked as full stack engineer for web applications - Point-of-Sale, dashboards, mobile banking apps.

projects.title: kiija
projects.description: Practice tool for basic mathematics such as arithmetic and algebra. Teaching tool motivated by my experience part-time tutoring students K-12 and having trouble finding practice material for students.

projects.title: todo time track
projects.description: Time tracker/todo app for time management. This project was oppurtunity to deliver a full stack solution for a common practice idea, that also doubled as a time tracking aid to help me better plan my daily tasks,

projects.title: transaction dispute
projects.description: Transaction dispute module for theoretical banking app. An interview assignment that prompted a functional full stack solution implementing a transaction dispute module in React and a backend of choice (I like node.js).
